items.content_html:
Summary

Adds links to tracking bugs for Firefox and WebKit for the cookie store api.

Test results and supporting details

WebKit Bug: https://webkit.org/b/231750

Firefox Bug: https://bugzil.la/1475599
items.title: Add links to tracking bugs for Cookie Store API

items.content_html: This PR removes MediaKeySystemConfiguration from BCD. This feature is a dictionary, enum, or WebIDL typedef and should not be included in BCD.
